languages.text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.
languages.original_text:
Когда охотника за головами атакуют в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} в первый раз после окончания его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} и передвигается на 1 клетку в противоположном направлении от атаковавшего.
Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the Hunter is attacked in melee range for the first time since the end of their turn, they automatically dodge that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Hunter does not provoke attacks of opportunity with this movement.

Whenever the Hunter is attacked in melee range for the first time since the end of their turn, they automatically dodge that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Hunter does not provoke attacks of opportunity with this movement.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

languages.text:
Когда охотника за головами атакуют в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} в первый раз после окончания его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} и передвигается на 1 клетку в противоположном направлении от атаковавшего.
Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
Когда охотника атакуют в ближнем бою в первый раз после окончания его хода, охотник автоматически уклоняется и передвигается на 1 клетку в противоположном направлении от атаковавшего.
Это движение не провоцирует атаку по возможности.

Когда охотника атакуют в ближнем бою в первый раз после окончания его хода, охотник автоматически уклоняется и передвигается на 1 клетку в противоположном направлении от атаковавшего.
Это движение не провоцирует атаку по возможности.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之后，若是赏金猎人首次在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内遭到攻击时，赏金猎人会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，并朝敌人的反方向移动一格。
赏金猎人此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之后，若是赏金猎人首次在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内遭到攻击时，赏金猎人会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，并朝敌人的反方向移动一格。
赏金猎人此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} reciba un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} por primera vez desde el final de su anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente ese ataque y se mueve 1 casilla en la dirección opuesta al enemigo.
El cazarrecompensas no provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} con este movimiento.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} reciba un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} por primera vez desde el final de su anterior {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente ese ataque y se mueve 1 casilla en la dirección opuesta al enemigo.
El cazarrecompensas no provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} con este movimiento.

languages.text:
Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} zum ersten Mal seit dem Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} angegriffen wird, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht{/g} er diesem Angriff automatisch aus und bewegt sich 1 Feld in die dem Feind entgegengesetzte Richtung.
Der Kopfgeldjäger provoziert mit dieser Bewegung keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} zum ersten Mal seit dem Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g} angegriffen wird, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht{/g} er diesem Angriff automatisch aus und bewegt sich 1 Feld in die dem Feind entgegengesetzte Richtung.
Der Kopfgeldjäger provoziert mit dieser Bewegung keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} est attaqué {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}en mêlée{/g} pour la première fois depuis la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement l'attaque et se déplace de 1 case dans la direction opposée à celle de l'ennemi.
Le chasseur de primes ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} avec ce déplacement.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque le Chasseur est attaqué à portée de combat de mêlée pour la première fois depuis la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} automatiquement l'attaque et se déplace de 1 case dans la direction opposée à celle de l'ennemi.
Le Chasseur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} avec ce déplacement.

languages.text:
自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了以降に{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}から攻撃を受けた時、その攻撃を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}し、敵と反対方向に1セル移動する。
バウンティハンターは、この移動では{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.

traits.locale_text:
自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了以降に{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}から攻撃を受けた時、その攻撃を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}し、敵と反対方向に1セル移動する。
バウンティハンターは、この移動では{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdikten sonra ilk kez {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzilinden{/g} saldırıya uğradığında o saldırıdan otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g} ve düşmanın tam aksi yönüne doğru 1 hücre hareket eder.
Ödül Avcısı'nın bu hareketi {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} is attacked in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} for the first time since the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} that attack and move 1 cell in the opposite direction from the enemy.
The Bounty Hunter does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} with this movement.
